topics.body:
[spoiler]It goes like this so far.
The Tesseract = Space Stone
Orb from Guardians = Power Stone
The Aether = Reality Stone
Loki's Sceptre = Mind Stone
That leaves the Time Stone and the Soul Stone unaccounted for.[/spoiler]
